summary: New dungeon near Valtheim Towers, North East of Whiterun
descriptionHtml:
- [color=cyan][u][b]Description:[/b][/u][/color]
This is my first dungeon so feedback is welcome! This is the final resting place of the once great Nord hero Valundre. He was famous for his sword, the Soul Reaper, it\'s been said that the sword steals the soul of anyone it kills.

[size=3]- [color=cyan][u][b]Difficulty:[/b][/u][/color][/size]
This is geared toward medium to high level characters but that doesn\'t mean it\'s impossible to clear at a low level.

- [color=cyan][u][b]Location:[/b][/u][/color]
It\'s North East of Whiterun, near the Valthiem Towers(see screenshots)

- [color=cyan][u][b]Future:[/b][/u][/color]
I might make it radiant story enabled or make a custom weapon model for the sword, but right now I\'m pretty busy with a big project.

- [color=cyan][u][b]Feedback:[/b][/u][/color]
If you like the dungeon let me know what kind of dungeon you\'d like to see next. Or if your having problems PM me or leave a comment and I\'ll try my best to fix it.

-------------------
- [color=cyan][u][b]ChangeLog:[/b][/u][/color]
-------------------
- V.1b
Fixed the trap bugs

- V.1
Release!

If you like my work than feel free to leave an endorsement, it help keeps me motivated and it\'s always nice to see : )
author: SteezMyster

files.name: The lost Tomb Of Valundre V1
